body: Sorry I read your PR message only now. I think a simpler way to do that would be to add attributes to storages that are living in the cache. Just take the `_weak_ref` return value, and do `ref.__original = True`. Then, use that in the function that rebuilds the storage to check if you're in the process that has created the storage.
